content: 6.8/18 M10 Clean-Tec powder cartridges (long) Collated .27 caliber long Clean-Tec cartridges for use with powder-actuated nailers for fastening metal decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Clean-Tec – free of lead and other heavy metals Designed specifically for use with Hilti powder-actuated tools as part of a matched tolerance system Delivers the most reliable fastenings and highest productivity when used with Hilti DX nailers Greater efficiency – numbered strips help to ensure that no cartridges are wasted Easier disposal – fully-utilized strips can be disposed of with regular waste Applications Powder-actuated fastening of profile metal decks to steel structures Fastening metal roofing, flooring, siding and composite decking ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): DX 750, DX 76, DX 76 PTR Cartridge type: .27 caliber long, 6.8/18 M10 Approvals: CE, CIP, PTB Technical Data | For use with (tools) | DX 750, DX 76, DX 76 PTR | Cartridge type | .27 caliber long, 6.8/18 M10 | Approvals | CE, CIP, PTB | Cartridge strip capacity | 10 | Storage temperature - min. | 41 °F | Storage temperature - max. | 77 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 416486 - Clean-Tec powder tool cartridge .27 cal black - Package Size 100 pc - 416485 - Cartridge 6.8/18 M10 .27 cal C-T blue - Package Size 100 pc - 416484 - Cartridge 6.8/18 M10 .27 cal C-T red - Package Size 100 pc - 416483 - Cartridge 6.8/18 M10 .27 cal C-T yellow - Package Size 100 pc
